question: Which Bollywood personality has been honoured with the Meryl Streep Award for Excellence?
explanation: At the first-ever Women in Film and Television (WIFT-2018) India Award, Actress Aishwarya Rai Bachchan  has been honoured with the Meryl Streep Award for Excellence in Washington, United States. The award was established to honour the best female talent in Bollywood and Hollywood. WIFT India is part of WIFT International, a network which promotes professional development and achievement for women in the film industry, video, and other screen-based media.
